Articles.Content:
Hello

I'm from Saturn and I love ksp. That is all, Hope to see you around!

Hi DarkStar64, welcome to the community

How's the view from out there?

Hello Darkstar, and welcome to the KSP forums!

That must be pretty inconvenient, how are you getting internet out there? On my recent visit to Jupiter it took forever to download anything... Must be hard to live there

The view is awesome!

Earth is a pale blue dot

Edit:In reply to sal_vager

Edited December 1, 2013 by DarkStar64

The view of Saturn was a pale beige dot when I lived in orbit of Neptune [beautiful place, recommend it], but I moved from this system and now I live on Dres.

It's nicer out here.

Hope you enjoy being sucked into the realm of awesome that is Kerbal Space Program!
What's this "Earth" you speak of? I'm living on Pluto, I only know of a Uranus, a Neptune, a Saturn, and a Jupiter. Us folks around here no nothing about this so said "Earth".
Welcome to the Kerbol system. Enjoy your stay
